The side food items are typically referred to as condiments or toppings and can include ketchup, mustard, mayonnaise, relish, onions, pickles, peppers, and other items.

The side food items are typically referred to as condiments, toppings, or garnishes. Common condiments for hot dogs include ketchup, mustard, relish, onions, chili, and cheese. Popular toppings for hot dogs include pickles, peppers, and onions. Salad bowls are usually filled with lettuce, tomatoes, and other vegetables.
